mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, l.started_at, l.ended_at FROM lecture l ORDER BY l.started_at DESC
SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, l.started_at, l.ended_at FROM lecture l WHERE l.instructor_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l.started_at DESC
SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, l.started_at, l.ended_at FROM lecture l JOIN lecture_enrollment le ON l.lecture_id = le.lecture_id WHERE le.student_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l.started_at DESC

SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, l.day, l.time, l.started_at, l.ended_at, l.room, l.instructor_id FROM lecture l JOIN lecture_enrollment e ON l.lecture_id = e.lecture_id WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId} AND NOW() BETWEEN l.started_at AND l.ended_at
SELECT lecture_id, title, day, time, started_at, ended_at, room, instructor_id FROM lecture WHERE instructor_id = #{instructorId} AND NOW() BETWEEN started_at AND ended_at
